data.label: Prophet Muḥammad
data.fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him

data.info: Father of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr and the first caliph in Islam
data.label: Abu Bakr as-Ṣiddīq

data.info: The second caliph in Islam
data.label: ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb

data.searchname: Muhammad ibn Muslim ibn Ubaydullah ibn Abdullah ibn Shihab al-Zuhri
data.label: Ibn Shihāb az-Zuhri
data.fullname: Muḥammad ibn Muslim ibn ʿUbaydullāh ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn Shihāb al-Zuhri

data.info: Servant of ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿUmar
data.searchname: Nafi Abu Abdullah Mawla Ibn Umar
data.label: Nāfiʿ Mawlā Ibn ʿUmar
data.fullname: Nāfiʿ Abu ʿAbdullāh Mawlā Ibn ʿUmar

data.info: Niece of ʿĀʾishah bint Abi Bakr
data.label: ʿAiʾshah bint Ṭalḥah

data.info: Nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
data.label: ʿUrwah ibn al-Zubayr

data.info: Brother of Ḥafṣah bint ʿUmar, another wife of the Prophet ﷺ
data.label: ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿUmar

data.info: Son of ʿAbdullah ibn ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb
data.searchname: Salim ibn Abdullah ibn Umar ibn al-Khattab
data.label: Sālim ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿUmar
data.fullname: Sālim ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb

data.info: Granddaughter of Abu Bakr and therefore the niece of ʿĀʾishah
data.searchname: Hafsah bint Abdur-Rahman ibn Abi Bakr
data.label: Ḥafṣah bint ʿAbdur-Raḥmān
data.fullname: Ḥafṣah bint ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn Abi Bakr

data.searchname: Salim ibn Abi Umayyah Abi an-Nadr
data.label: Sālim ibn Abi Umayyah
data.fullname: Sālim ibn Abi Umayyah Abi an-Naḍr

data.info: Wife of Hishām ibn ʿUrwah ibn al-Zubayr and great-niece of ʿĀʾishah bint Abi Bakr
data.searchname: Fatimah bint al-Munthir ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam
data.label: Fāṭimah bint al-Munthir ibn al-Zubayr
data.fullname: Fāṭimah bint al-Munthir ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām

data.info: Founder of one of the four legal schools of thought in Sunni Islam
data.label: Imām Mālik

data.info: Son of al-Qāsim ibn Muḥammad and great-nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
data.searchname: Abdur-Rahman ibn al-Qasim ibn Muhammad ibn Abi Bakr
data.label: ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn al-Qāsim
data.fullname: ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn al-Qāsim ibn Muḥammad ibn Abi Bakr

data.info: Nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
data.searchname: al-Qasim ibn Muhammad ibn Abi Bakr
data.label: al-Qāsim ibn Muḥammad
data.fullname: al-Qāsim ibn Muḥammad ibn Abi Bakr

data.info: Son of Ābdullāh ibn ʿUmar and therefore nephew of Ḥafṣah bint ʿUmar
data.searchname: Hamzah ibn Abdullāh ibn Umar ibn al-Khattab
data.label: Ḥamzah ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿUmar
data.fullname: Ḥamzah ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb

data.info: 8th century jurist, author, ascetic, and hafiẓ
data.label: Sufyān al-Thawri

data.info: Son of Ṣafiyyah bint Shaybah, sometimes referred to as Manṣur ibn Ṣafiyyah
data.searchname: Mansur ibn Abdur-Rahman ibn Wahb ibn Uthman ibn Talhah
data.label: Manṣūr ibn ʿAbdur-Raḥmān
data.fullname: Manṣūr ibn ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn Wahb ibn ʿUthmān ibn Ṭalḥah

data.info: Son of Khayrah Umm al-Hasan al-Baṣri, and famous scholar from Iraq
data.label: al-Hasan al-Baṣri

data.info: Founder of one of the four legal schools of thought in Sunni Islam: the Hanbali mathhab
data.label: Aḥmad ibn Ḥanbal

data.info: Son of ʿUrwah ibn al-Zubayr and great-nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
data.searchname: Hisham ibn Urwah ibn az-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam
data.label: Hishām ibn ʿUrwah
data.fullname: Hishām ibn ʿUrwah ibn az-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām

data.info: Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daught of Abi Sufyān
data.searchname: Umm Ḥabībah Ramlah bint Abi Sufyan
data.label: Ramlah bint Abi Sufyān
data.fullname: Umm al-Muʿminīn Umm Ḥabībah Ramlah bint Abi Sufyān

data.info: Daughter of the Prophet and step-daughter of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
data.label: Fāṭimah bint Muḥamamd

data.info: Great-great-great grandson of ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb
data.searchname: Ubaydullah ibn Umar ibn Hafs ibn Asim ibn Umar ibn al-Khattab
data.label: ʿUbaydullāh ibn ʿUmar
data.fullname: ʿUbaydullāh ibn ʿUmar ibn Ḥafṣ ibn ʿĀṣim ibn ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb

data.info: Sister of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
data.label: Asmāʾ bint Abi Bakr

data.searchname: Abu Salamah ibn Abdur-Rahman ibn Awf
data.label: Abu Salamah ibn ʿAbdur-Raḥmān
data.fullname: Abu Salamah ibn ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn ʿAwf

data.info: Nephew of ʿĀʾishah bint Ṭalḥah
data.searchname: Muawiyah ibn Ishaq ibn Talhah ibn Ubaydillah
data.label: Muʿāwiyah ibn Isḥāq
data.fullname: Muʿāwiyah ibn Isḥāq ibn Ṭalḥah ibn ʿUbaydillāh

data.info: Wife of Ābdullāh ibn ʿUmar
data.searchname: Safiyyah bint Abi Ubayd ibn Masud al-Thaqafi
data.label: Ṣafiyyah bint Abi ʿUbayd al-Thaqafi
data.fullname: Ṣafiyyah bint Abi ʿUbayd ibn Masʿūd al-Thaqafi

data.info: Nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Ṭalḥah
data.searchname: Talhah ibn Yahya ibn Ṭalhah ibn Ubaydillah
data.label: Ṭalḥah ibn Yaḥya
data.fullname: Ṭalḥah ibn Yaḥya ibn Ṭalḥah ibn ʿUbaydillāh

data.info: 8th century author of the famous Sīrat Rasūlullah, a biography of the Prophet Muḥammad ﷺ
data.label: Ibn Isḥāq

data.info: Nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
data.label: ʿAbdullāh ibn al-Zubayr

data.info: Servant of Umm Salamah and the mother of the famous scholar, Al-Hasan Al-Baṣri
data.label: Khayrah Umm al-Hasan al-Baṣri

data.info: Nephew of Ṣafiyyah bint Shaybah
data.searchname: Abdul Hamid ibn Jubayr ibn Shaybah
data.label: ʿAbdul Ḥamīd ibn Jubayr
data.fullname: ʿAbdul Ḥamīd ibn Jubayr ibn Shaybah

data.info: One of the Seven Jurists (Fuqahāʿ) of Medina
data.searchname: Said ibn al-Musayyib ibn Hazn al-Qurashi al-Makhzumi
data.label: Saʿīd ibn al-Musayyib
data.fullname: Saʿīd ibn al-Musayyib ibn Ḥazn al-Qurashi al-Makhzūmi

data.searchname: Amrah bint Abdur-Rahman ibn Sad ibn Zararah
data.label: ʿAmrah bint ʿAbd ur-Raḥmān
data.fullname: ʿAmrah bint ʿAbd ur-Raḥmān ibn Saʿd ibn Zarārah

data.description: This is a graph of hadith narrators - work in progress
